alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Harrison; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 10:36PM EDT until July 29 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM EDT/1000 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHWESTERN HARRISON...SOUTHEASTERN CRAWFORD... EASTERN PERRY...MEADE...NORTHWESTERN HARDIN AND CENTRAL BRECKINRIDGE COUNTIES... At 1036 PM EDT/936 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Carefree Town to 10 miles west of Brandenburg to Hardinsburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Brandenburg, Hardinsburg, Mount Pleasant, Webster, Irvington, Ekron, Mauckport, Alton, Laconia and New Amsterdam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
